alert.note: Alert for Gove; Logan; Sheridan; Thomas; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 6:27AM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Wallace, southeastern Thomas, Logan, southern Sheridan and northwestern Gove Counties through 600 AM MDT/700 AM CDT/... At 526 AM MDT/626 AM CDT/, trained weather spotters reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Menlo to 6 miles northwest of Monument to 4 miles north of Wallace. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Automated weather station at the Colby Airport reported a 50 mph gust at 615 AM CDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Menlo around 630 AM CDT. Monument around 640 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Grainfield. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 61 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
